timeServer.title: Time Server
timeServer.description: The NTP server to connect to. In macOS 10.13 and later, only one time server is supported.

timeZone.title: Time Zone
timeZone.description: The time zone path location string in '/usr/share/zoneinfo/'; for example, 'America/Denver' or 'Zulu'.
